description:
11.267 untile
Decompose a video made of tiled images into the individual images.

The frame rate of the output video is the frame rate of the input video
multiplied by the number of tiles.

This filter does the reverse of tile.

The filter accepts the following options:

layout.description: Set the grid size (i.e. the number of lines and columns). For the syntax of this option, check the "Video size" section in the ffmpeg-utils manual.

name: untile

parameters.description: Set the grid size (i.e. the number of lines and columns). For the syntax of this option, check the (ffmpeg-utils)"Video size" section in the ffmpeg-utils manual.
parameters.name: layout

source:
11.267 untile

Decompose a video made of tiled images into the individual images.

The frame rate of the output video is the frame rate of the input video multiplied by the number of tiles.

This filter does the reverse of tile.

The filter accepts the following options:

layout

Set the grid size (i.e. the number of lines and columns). For the syntax of this option, check the (ffmpeg-utils)"Video size" section in the ffmpeg-utils manual.
